title: Baby carrier panel (or apron)
description: dark blue with lighter blue backing; rectangular panel edged in blue and white batik lappets on three sides; two bands of embroidery (predominately red and salmon pink) with geometric designs in squares and bands on three sides inside batik border band; embroidered areas separated by batik fabric with border band designs; central batik rectangle with two diamonds and floral designs
creditline: Given in memory of Lynn Swanson
